mapper.select: select a.id,a.create_time,a.content,a.url,a.isread, a.from_member_id,b.name as from_member_name,b.avatar as from_member_avatar, a.to_member_id,c.name as to_member_name,c.avatar as to_member_avatar from tbl_message as a LEFT JOIN tbl_member as b ON a.from_member_id = b.id LEFT JOIN tbl_member as c ON a.to_member_id = c.id WHERE (a.from_member_id = #{fromMemberId} AND a.to_member_id = #{toMemberId}) OR (a.from_member_id = #{toMemberId} AND a.to_member_id = #{fromMemberId}) ORDER BY a.id DESC

SELECT a.id,a.create_time,a.from_member_id,a.to_member_id,a.isread,a.app_tag,a.relate_key_id,a.type,a.member_id,a.content, b.name as member_name,b.avatar as member_avatar, c.name as from_member_name,c.avatar as from_member_avatar, d.name as to_member_name,d.avatar as to_member_avatar, (CASE WHEN (a.type > 10000 AND a.type < 20000) THEN (SELECT CONCAT(a.description,'《',e.title,'》') FROM tbl_article as f left JOIN tbl_archive AS e ON f.archive_id = e.archive_id WHERE f.id=a.relate_key_id) WHEN (a.type > 20000 AND a.type < 22000) THEN (SELECT CONCAT(a.description,'《',content,'》') FROM tbl_weibo WHERE id=a.relate_key_id) WHEN (a.type > 22000 AND a.type < 23000) THEN (SELECT CONCAT(a.description,'《',content,'》') FROM tbl_weibo_comment WHERE id=a.relate_key_id) WHEN (a.type > 31000 AND a.type < 33000) THEN (SELECT CONCAT(a.description,'《',i.title,'》') FROM tbl_group_topic as h left JOIN tbl_archive AS i ON h.archive_id = i.archive_id WHERE h.id=a.relate_key_id) WHEN (a.type > 33000 AND a.type < 34000) THEN (SELECT CONCAT(a.description,'《',content,'》') FROM tbl_group_topic_comment WHERE id=a.relate_key_id) END) AS description FROM tbl_message as a LEFT JOIN tbl_member as b ON a.member_id=b.id LEFT JOIN tbl_member as c ON a.from_member_id=c.id LEFT JOIN tbl_member as d ON a.to_member_id=d.id WHERE a.app_tag != 0 AND a.to_member_id = #{toMemberId} ORDER BY a.id DESC
